text: 7:22 Isa. 35:5-6; 61:1  Iyesus woshere watswotssh hank'owa bí et, «Aanar amr Yohanssh it bek'tsonat it shishtson keewwore, hambe dogwots bek'irunee, shoklirwotswere kawdek't sha'irune, een shodetswotsu s'aynirune, gidik'uwotswere shishirune, k'irtswotswere tuwirune, t'owwotssho doo shisho nabeyirwee.
